Indicator name
Alcohol expenditure as a per cent of total household expenditure

Name abbreviated
Alcohol expenditure as a per cent of total household expenditure

Data Type Representation
Percent

Topic
Risk factors

ISO Health Indicators Framework

    

Rationale

    

Definition
The amount of money spent on the purchase of alcohol as a per cent of all money available for household expenses.

Preferred data sources
Administrative reporting system

As reported in data supplied by statistical departments and in published reports and articles.
